revised_title: Jagadis Chunder Bose: A Pioneering Scientist and Educator
tldr: Jagadis Chunder Bose was a pioneering Indian scientist and educator who made significant contributions to the fields of physics and biology. He conducted research on electromagnetic waves, plant and animal tissue responses, and the similarities between living and non-living matter. Bose founded the Bose Institute in Calcutta, which provided facilities for scientific research and education in India. His work and life are celebrated as an important chapter in the cultural history of Bengal.
